official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to make it clear that any State may impose work requirements as a condition of eligibility for aid to families with dependent children.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act to permit States to require any individual to work as a condition of eligibility for AFDC benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to make it clear that any State may impose work requirements as a condition of eligibility for aid to families with dependent children.
